name: Endless kitty
description:
You are a kitty running in a house! and your objetive is to collect as many points as you can while avoiding the obstacles.

Includes:

  • Menu and gameplay songs.
  • Lots of sounds (like collisions, losing, pressing a button, doing an specific action, etc).
  • Original textures, and some borrowed ones (credits in the credits screen of the game).
  • Three diferent levels of parallax in gameplay.
  • Dash and jump actions.
  • Three different kinds of obstacles and pikups.
  • Working in different frame rates.
  • Playable in 5 different screen widths and heights.
